metadata.title: CVE-2023-1532 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds read in GPU Video in Google Chrome prior to 111.0.5563.110allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
